div1.p: The President of Panama, Manuel Amador Guerrero, invests the Canal Zone Sanitary Officer with full sanitary authority for Panama City and Colon.

div1.head: Presidential Decree No. 25, July 7, 1904
div1.p:
The President of the Republic, by virtue of the powers invested in him,
issues the following decree:

Art. 1. The Chief Sanitary Officer of the Isthmian Canal Commission
is hereby authorized to assume charge of all that relates to the sanitation and
health in the cities of Colon and Panama.

Art. 2. He is hereby given authority to make such rules and regula-
tions as may by him be deemed necessary, and to enforce fines and otherwise
obedience thereto.

Art. 3. These fines shall be collected, and punishments executed,
through the proper authorities of the Republic, in the cities of Panama and Colon.
Given and published in Panama, on the 8th of July, 1904.
